# stripe_v2_billing_rate_card_rate (Resource)

Manages a stripe_v2_billing_rate_card_rate resource in Stripe.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `rate_card_id` (String) Path parameter: rate_card_id

### Optional

- `metadata` (Map of String) Set of [key-value pairs](/docs/api/metadata) that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.
- `metered_item` (String) The Metered Item that this rate binds to.
- `tiering_mode` (String) Defines whether the tiered price should be graduated or volume-based. In volume-based tiering, the maximum quantity within a period determines the per-unit price. In graduated tiering, the pricing changes as the quantity grows into new tiers. Can only be set if `tiers` is set.
- `tiers` (Block List) Each element represents a pricing tier. Cannot be set if `unit_amount` is provided. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--tiers))
- `unit_amount` (String) The per-unit amount to be charged, represented as a decimal string in minor currency units with at most 12 decimal places. Cannot be set if `tiers` is provided.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--tiers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tiers`

Optional:

- `flat_amount` (String) Price for the entire tier, represented as a decimal string in minor currency units with at most 12 decimal places.
- `unit_amount` (String) Per-unit price for units included in this tier, represented as a decimal string in minor currency units with at most 12 decimal places.
- `up_to_decimal` (String) Up to and including this quantity will be contained in the tier. Only one of `up_to_decimal` and `up_to_inf` may be set.
- `up_to_inf` (String) No upper bound to this tier. Only one of `up_to_decimal` and `up_to_inf` may be set.
